patterns: Tell me something about Computer Science and Engineering Department
Year of Establishment of Computer Science and Engineering Department
Different Degree offered in CSE department
responses:
Vison - 
 To promote Research and Development in the frontier areas of Computer Science & Engineering. 
 To generate Competent Professionals to become part of the industry and Research Organizations at the National and International levels. 
 To provide necessary strengths to enable the students to Innovate and to become Entrepreneurs 


 Mission - To impart effective education at undergraduate levels in the field of Computer Science and Engineering 
 To conduct Research and Development and offer consultancy services. 
 To improve continuously the quality of teaching-learning process. 
 To strive steadily for the overall growth and development of intellect and personality of the students who, as professionals, would be confident to face the challenges of the world of work. 
 To empower the faculty and staff for overall development of students. 


 Year Of Establishment - 
 Year 2000 


 Intake - 
 B.Teh. (Comp. Sc. Engg.) - 114 


 Degree Offered - 
  Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech.) in Computer Science & Engineering.

patterns: Tell me Something about National Institute of Technology Raipur
Tell me Something about NIT Raipur
responses: The institute is committed to the challenging task of development of technical education by preparing seasoned graduates in highly sophisticated field of engineering and technology. Development of India as an emerging industrial power is a demanding exercise as it involves the combination of cost effectiveness and efficiency along with producing world-class technology at the cutting edge. For about five decades we have been doing it with sincerity and commitment at NIT Raipur. At present the institute offers graduate level courses in twelve disciplines.

patterns: Who is Director of National Institute of Technoogy Raipur
Who is Director of NIT Raipur
Tell me something about Director NIT Raipur
responses: Dr. N.V. Ramana Rao is at present Director & Professor of Civil Engineering at National Institute of Technology Raipur. He did his BE in Civil Engineering from (Osmania), M.Tech from (IIT Delhi), Ph.D (from (UK) and Post Doctorate.(from UK) in Civil and Structural Engineering from University of Wales, Swansea , UK. He has held several Administrative posts as Registrar, JNTU Hyderabad, Kukatpally, Hyderabad from 30.04.2012 to 21.07.2015, as Principal, JNTUH College of Engineering Hyderabad, Kukatpally, Hyderabad from 30.04.2008 to 24.11.2011, as Director, Bureau of Industrial Consultancy Services, JNTU, Hyderabad from 05.09.2003 to 05.05.2006, as Co-ordinator, Entrepreneurship Development Cell, JNTU, Hyderabad from 01.08.2002 to 31.01.2004.

patterns: How many books are their in central Library
responses: The Central Library of NIT, Raipur has a good collection of more than 1 lakh of print books , more than 1.7 lacs e-books consisting of both text and reference books Ph.D theses, online journal Archive collections and online protocols . Besides it subscribes to a good number of full text online databases ,Indian print journals . The Central Library is fully automated through LibSys7- Library management software .The Web OPAC is fully functional. RFID system has been installed in the Reading Room of Central Library.It also has Discovery Service ,Remote access facilities and plagiarism check software like Turnitin Feedback Studio and URKUND .It caters to the information and document need of nearly 5000 users consisting of Faculty members, staff, B.Tech/M.Tech/MCA students and research scholars satisfactorily.

patterns: what are the Hostel faciities in NIT Raipur
How many Hostels are their in NIT Raipur
responses:
The institute provides a limited residential facility for boys and girls students. There are 05 boys and 03 girls’ hostels within the campus. 

 The Institute offers limited residential facility for the students (boys) admitted to various courses in the institute. There are 05 boys’ hostels inside the campus. All hostels have an approximate capacity to house about 1180 inmates. Each hostel is self-contained with amenities, such as recreation cum dining hall with mess, badminton court, garden, etc. All the hostel rooms are adequately furnished. Hostel administration is managed by Chief Warden, a senior faculty member with a team of efficient Wardens. In addition, there is employed one caretaker for each hostel to manage day-to-day affairs of the hostel. Hostel office has full-fledged supporting staff and other workers. 

 The Institute offers limited residential facility for the students (girls) admitted to various courses in the institute. There are 04 girls’ hostels inside the campus. All hostels have an approximate capacity to house about 414 inmates. Each hostel is self-contained with amenities, such as recreation cum dining hall with mess, gym, garden, etc. All the hostel rooms are adequately furnished. Hostel administration is managed by Chief Warden, a senior faculty member with a team of efficient Wardens. In addition, there is one Matron for each hostel to manage day-to-day affairs of the hostel. Hostel office has full-fledged supporting staff and other workers.

patterns: Where is the Guest House Located
Who all can use Guest House
responses: Guest House of the institute provides accommodation facility to the institute guests, guests of the faculty/staff members of the institute, parents of the students, visitors from other NITs and educational institutes, participants of the activities organised by the institute and persons with approval from appropriate authorities. Guest house has three living rooms, one dining hall and one hall. All rooms are equipped with state of art facilities like AC, TV, and Refrigerator etc.

patterns: What items can we get from vachan
responses: Vachan Milk Parlour, being located in close proximity to the Main Building of the Institute, was inaugurated on January 05, 2023 by Dr. (Mrs.) A. B. Soni, Director NIT Raipur in the presence of Dr. P. Y. Dhekne, Dean (Student Welfare & Faculty Welfare); Dr. Shrish Verma, Dean (Academics); Mr. Ajaii Sharma, Joint Registrar and other dignitaries. The facility has a wide range of dairy products and food items where students and employees can eat as well as interact with their peers.

patterns: What is Finance and consulting club
What Finance and consulting club do
Aim of Finance and consulting club
responses: The central focus of the Finance club is to cultivate interest among the students towards the financial sector as well as to promote it as aviable career option post their engineering degree.Finance club will provide students an opportunity to explore the world of Finance,Business Consulting and Analytics.The club plans to not only connect members with alumni and finance professionals but also extend practicalfinancial education with job-specific knowledge.We plan to achieve this goal through collaborative learning and facilitating career continuity by connecting students,industry and academics.

patterns: Do we have Drama club in college
Different activities abhinay perform in college
responses: ABHINAY- THE DRAMATICS CLUB portrays society through art. We perform street plays, stage dramas, sketches, poems, etc. Abhinay gives students a platform to showcase their talent and also works on polishing their skills. It is a disciplined as well as a wellmentored club. Here, people express themselves and shape their personalities and gain confidence. Club members are exposed to different aspects of theatre including impromptu skits, monologues, playwriting, dialogue delivery, building character, stage presence, etc. Here they learn to work as a team and groom their personality which helps them in their future endeavours

patterns: Do we have Robotix club in college
Different activities Robotix club perform in college
responses: ROBOTiX Club is the Robotics outreach of NIT Raipur. The   was founded in the year 2014 with the purpose of technological skills in the diverse fields of mechatronics robotics by transcending the theoretical knowledge into applications to provide   modelled   solutions   for   real- problems.

patterns: Do we have sports club in college
Different activities sports club perform in college
What is the main event of Shaurya
responses:
SHAURYA - THE SPORTS COMMITTEE : Students with proven technical credentials unite with a common aim to nurture the sportsman inside every one of us to give a platform where quality of sportsmanship can be woven in each one of us. Shaurya has been at the helm of conducting all the sports activities in the institute. the committee organizes events Samar( the annual sports fest), Inter-branch tournaments, etc. The committee also helps in proper structuring and formation of teams which represent NIT Raipur in national level sports fest including Inter-NIT Sports meet. 

 SAMAR was the Annual College Sports Festival of NIT Raipur was organised by SHAURYA The Sports Committee of NIT Raipur. It was a four day event held in the month of December in which students from various colleges across Chhattisgarh came forward to participate. Over the years SAMAR has evolved and expanded to become the best sports extravaganza. One experiences the 4 days of awesomeness here. Being the most awaited event of the year, it is a platform where youths get together and showcase their talents and sportsmanship. NIT Raipur sports boasts of a rich culture, thriving immense participation. Samar was one of the best experience at NITRR and has a rich string of memories linked with it. SAMAR brings with it a great opportunity to show your endeavour along with fun and enjoyment.

patterns: Do we have Technology club in college
Different activities Technocracy perform in college
What is the main event of Technocracy
responses: The TechnoCracy is the students’ technical committee of NIT Raipur. It was a seed sown in 2007 by a few technical enthusiasts, which has grown and established its strong roots. Currently, it comprises of over 100 members. The vision of TechnoCracy is to bring out the technical thirst in every student through their innovative ideas and help them discover the concealed, untapped avenues of science and technology.  The TechnoCracy remains active throughout the year and conducts various workshops like on robotics, IOT (Internet Of Things), seminars by eminent personalities and guest lectures by alumni. The TechnoCracy is known to organize the Annual Science and Technical Festival of NIT Raipur; “AAVARTAN” which is the largest tech-fest of central India, by all standards. The main aim of AAVARTAN is to provide a national level platform for students to showcase their technical flair. It aspires to bring out the hidden and dormant engineer inside each student. It inspires students and gives them a whole new and enriching perspective in the world of technology and entrepreneurship.

patterns: Do we have Music club in college
Different activities Ragga perform in college
What is the main event of Ragga
responses: NIT Raipur’s music club, RAAGA, was started in 2009 with the support of Director, Dean Students’ Welfare, Dr. S. Sanyal as Professor incharge and Dr. Ayush Khare as Faculty Incharge. It has been working continuously since then and has been successful in its aim which is to provide a platform to the students who are interested in music. Every year, Team Raaga give its contribution in every cultural event including Independence Day, Republic Day, Alumni-Meet, Eclectika’s Cult Nite, etc. Raaga is best known for organizing annual music eve – Shruti.

patterns: Do we have photgraphy club in college
Different activities click club perform in college
responses: click club is a hub for photgraphic enthusiast in NIT Raipur. It aims to showcase ones talent and learn from each experiance in a collaborative way. We being so called universal club, handle official all converage charge of events.

patterns: Different activities Go Green club perform in college
responses: Go Green,The Eco-social committee of NIT Raipur was founded with the purpose of educating the student population about the environmental perils that awaits us in near future. If the present youth does not take up a course of action, these problems will soon eclipse the whole of the earth. So we take it as a responsibility to make sure present youth are ready to turn up against any ill treatment to the mother Earth and be responsible themselves. Our vision is to be the pioneers of environmental justice and awareness in India and be the oath keepers of the responsibility and on us that is rested upon mankind to maintain nature’s integrity and purity to its original form.

patterns: Do we have Mentorship club in college
Different activities Sahyog perform in college
responses: The primary objective of Sahyog - The Mentorship Club is of providing constructive and positive interaction to students of NIT Raipur. The club continues to be a guidance source to students through various events based on societal and personal growth. Over the years members of Sahyog act as mentors by lending a helping hand towards fellow students There has been an organization of events such as Mock Placements, Career Counseling sessions, Aptitude Tests and Group discussions to help students advance in preparations for various career paths. Alongside there have been programs such as Blood Donation camp, Remedial classes, Green library and Student guidance sessions to provide an environment of social well-being and growth. Sahyog strives to bridge the gap between the institute's administration and student affairs. Sahyog is one of the club's which motivates students to look and work beyond the bubble of academics and step into the dynamics of the real world.

patterns: Do we have Dance club in college
Different activities Nrityam perform in college
responses: Ever since its foundation in 2016, Nrityam – the Dance Club of NIT Raipur has been actively functioning to improve the level of various dance forms in the college. It aims at promoting dancing through various platforms and encourages the dancers to showcase their talent by organizing various events.Team Nrityam believes that dance is a mediumt hrough which we can feel close to our own culture and learn about the other cultures as well. Further,Nrityam provides the students with a break from regular routines by making them groove to the beats.

patterns: Do we have Anual Fest in college
Different activities that happen in Eclectika
responses: Annual Cultural fest. Eclectika , the cultural festival of NIT Raipur is widely renowned as the largest fest in central India. With a participation roster exceeding over 1 hundred colleges across the academic demographic of India, Eclectika is a glorious rendition of the ideals of innovation, conception and determination to achieve high heights of success, and is a phenomenal platform to nurture and inspire talent, while uniting a wide and diverse participation pool under a single banner. We have seen artists such as Mohit Chauhan, Sachin, Jigar and many more names to follow.Eclectika has been a home to more than 50 different events during the three days, main attraction being our 6 mega events, EDM nite, pronite and the cultnite.

patterns: How to get a good Job offer
How to get a good placement
What different skills are required to get placed
responses: Different skills required for placement are Data structures and Algorithm, CS Fundamentals, projects and good communication skills

patterns: How to study data structures and algorithms
How to be good at Data structures and algorithms
From where to study Data structures and algorithms
responses:
Online Platforms: 
 Websites like LeetCode, HackerRank, CodeSignal, and GeeksforGeeks offer a vast collection of problems categorized by difficulty and topic. Solve problems regularly, starting with easy ones and gradually moving to more challenging ones. 

 Books and Resources: Use textbooks like Cracking the Coding Interview by Gayle Laakmann McDowell or Introduction to Algorithms by Thomas H. Cormen for in-depth study. Explore online resources, such as Khan Academy and MIT OpenCourseWare, for video lectures on algorithms and data structures. 

 Competitive Programming: 
 Participate in online coding competitions like Codeforces, Topcoder, and Google Code Jam. Competitive programming challenges often cover a wide range of algorithmic problems and improve your problem-solving skills.

patterns: How to sudy Database management system
How to sudy object oriented programming
responses:
Study operating systems by reading textbooks, working on hands-on projects, and understanding key concepts such as processes, memory management, file systems, and system calls. 

 Study database management systems by reading textbooks, practicing SQL queries, designing databases, and understanding concepts like normalization, indexing, and transaction management. 

 Study computer networks by reading textbooks, implementing practical exercises, understanding protocols, and exploring topics such as TCP/IP, OSI model, and network security. 

 Study object-oriented programming (OOP) by learning key principles (encapsulation, inheritance, polymorphism), practicing with OOP languages like Java or C++, and applying concepts in coding projects.
